About This Calculator

How It Works

This calculator determines the number of drywall sheets needed by calculating net wall area (total area minus openings), dividing by sheet size, and adding waste factor. It also estimates joint compound requirements.

Assumptions

  • Standard rectangular wall layouts
  • Single layer drywall installation
  • Joint compound: ~0.8 lbs per sheet
  • Does not include corner bead or accessories
  • Pricing based on regional averages

Professional Use

This calculator provides ROM estimates for preliminary budgeting. For complex layouts, cathedral ceilings, or specialty applications, consult with drywall professionals for accurate material takeoffs.
